keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: An easy vegetarian version of this Hungarian classic. A Rose Elliot recipe.

method.text: Fry the onions and pepper in the oil in a large saucepan for 10 min, until soft but not browned.
Add the pepper and cook for 5 min, then stir in the garlic, paprika, butter beans and tomatoes. Bring to boil then simmer gently for 10 minutes. Season to taste.

title: Butter bean goulash
